EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Summary Call (1340664884.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Gustavo, It was a pleasure speaking with you. A great place to go for our research about this indpendant market place can be found here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources> Additionally I have have provided my private page that I send to consultants, this will give you a better idea of our service offerening; you can access it by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> We will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Best regards,Sara/Steve___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
